en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors RM 10,000 to Vietnam Paralympics Team!
en.content: FusionExcel is proud to sponsor RM 10,000 to the Vietnamese Paralympics Team. At the FusionExcel Vietnam Recognition Dinner held recently at Dai Khanh Restaurant, Ho Chi Minh City. FusionExcel's Founder CEO Paul Ting presented the mockup cheque to the Paralympics Team. Each member of the team was also presented with a Quantum Pendant.

meta.description: FusionExcel, RM 10,000 to Vietnam Paralympics Team, FusionExcel Vietnam Recognition Dinner, Dai Khanh Restaurant, Ho Chi Minh City, CEP Paul Ting, Quantum Pendnt.
meta.keyword: FusionExcel is proud to sponsor RM 10,000 to the Vietnamese Paralympics Team. At the FusionExcel Vietnam Recognition Dinner held recently at Dai Khanh Restaurant, Ho Chi Minh City.
meta.author: klhunter
